### getAnalysisUsage() {#a401fddeacac222c9da6d8f079df1ae73}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;CFIInstrInserter.cpp&#125;::CFIInstrInserter::getAnalysisUsage (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/analysisusage">AnalysisUsage</a> &amp;) const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
getAnalysisUsage - This function should be overriden by passes that need analysis information to do their job.

If a pass specifies that it uses a particular analysis result to this function, it can then use the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass/#a4863e5e463fb79955269fbf7fbf52b80">getAnalysis&lt;AnalysisType&gt;()</a> function, below.

### calculateOutgoingCFAInfo() {#af0c1fd4e752079ccf6a04deea586b33f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void CFIInstrInserter::calculateOutgoingCFAInfo (MBBCFAInfo &amp; MBBInfo)</>}>
Calculate cfa offset and register values valid at basic block exit by checking the block for CFI instructions.

Block&#39;s incoming CFA info remains the same.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/cfiinstrinserter-cpp/#l00111">111</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/cfiinstrinserter-cpp">CFIInstrInserter.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getCorrectCFAOffset() {#a08478df876e525ecaf28eec6f59d546a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>int64&#95;t anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;CFIInstrInserter.cpp&#125;::CFIInstrInserter::getCorrectCFAOffset (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; MBB)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Return the cfa offset value that should be set at the beginning of a MBB if needed.

The negated value is needed when creating CFI instructions that set absolute offset.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/cfiinstrinserter-cpp/#l00124">124</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/cfiinstrinserter-cpp">CFIInstrInserter.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### insertCFIInstrs() {#a6a34ace752189f35b070c84a28845cab}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool CFIInstrInserter::insertCFIInstrs (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF)</>}>
Check if incoming CFA information of a basic block matches outgoing CFA information of the previous block.

If it doesn&#39;t, insert CFI instruction at the beginning of the block that corrects the CFA calculation rule for that block.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/cfiinstrinserter-cpp/#l00120">120</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/cfiinstrinserter-cpp">CFIInstrInserter.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
